attributes.action: Make Cyclists display number plates and have mandatory insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists are far and away the least considerate road users and yet cannot be traced or brought to account for their deplorable road habits.
Mandatory number plates would allow them to be brought to book and mandatory insurance enable victims of their moronic actions (regarding jumping red lights, going the wrong way down one way streets and riding on the pavement with total disregard for the rights and safety of others) to claim for damages and injury.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
